title: Dixon Tech stock tumbles 9%; management says ED seizure of Xiaomi assets will not impact co - Economic Times
content: Dixon Tech stock tumbles 9%; management says ED seizure of Xiaomi assets will not impact co  Economic Times
description: The Enforcement Directorate Saturday "seized" over Rs 5,551-crore worth fund of Chinese mobile manufacturing company Xiaomi for violating the Indian foreign exchange law, officials said. Dixon Tech management has clarified that ED’s seizure of Xiaomi India assets will have no impact with relation to payments. Dixon Tech is Xiaomi’s manufacturing partner for LED TVs. CFO Saurabh Gupta shares more details. Listen-in!!!
